SET(CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME Generic-PS4)

IF(NOT $ENV{SCE_ORBIS_SDK_DIR} EQUAL "")
	STRING(REGEX REPLACE "\\\\" "/" PS4_SDK_DIR $ENV{SCE_ORBIS_SDK_DIR})
	SET(CMAKE_C_COMPILER ${PS4_SDK_DIR}/host_tools/bin/orbis-clang.exe)
	# SET(CMAKE_C_COMPILER_TARGET ORBIS)
	SET(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER ${PS4_SDK_DIR}/host_tools/bin/orbis-clang++.exe)
	# SET(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_TARGET ORBIS) 
ELSE()
	MESSAGE("SCE_ORBIS_SDK_DIR environment variable not defined!")
ENDIF()
